column1: Kershaw County Schools are leading the way in the use of thermal imaging technology to help reduce the spread of COVID.  Thrilled to spend time with faculty and staff there this morning. https://t.co/h2k5sb8wFB
As with everyone who has or will contract COVID let's pray President @realDonaldTrump and @FLOTUS' symptoms remain mild for their speedy recovery and for the wellbeing of those around them.  🇺🇸
Biden’s new narrative: every COVID death... Trump’s fault. https://t.co/Sop9qIOM1M
Could TSA checkpoints serve to help mitigate the spread of COVID-19 and future pandemics? The Healthy Skies Act aims to find out.  My op-ed with @RepTedBudd  ⬇️⬇️⬇️  https://t.co/1DfrAfn4et

Long before this pandemic Congress should have been working to slash unnecessary spending.  If *trillions* of unexpected borrowing needed for COVID response won't get this conversation started now then what will?  https://t.co/NSoFicaprL

Until we have rapid testing let's look into temp screenings at TSA checkpoints. It won't catch asymptomatic flyers but it could prevent thousands with one of the most common #COVID19 symptoms (i.e. fever) from boarding a flight & placing others at risk.  https://t.co/cd5QDRMVnQ https://t.co/YnDUWNUEIO

Last week I introduced a bill to help #Congress and health officials better understand the degree to which #TSA checkpoints could serve in some limited capacity as a way to help mitigate the spread of #COVID and future pandemics.  More at: https://t.co/AeyBYCQdAX https://t.co/1oPpPlBi04

Since a fever is one of the most common symptoms of #COVID19 then perhaps #TSA checkpoints could serve in some limited capacity to help reduce spread through #airtravel.  Just introduced: the #HealthySkiesAct with @RepTedBudd.  ⬇️⬇️⬇️  https://t.co/AeyBYCQdAX https://t.co/AkII7vWDbi

New York the epicenter of our coronavirus crisis with more than one-third of all cases nationally is actually TAXING out-of-state healthcare workers who came to help the Empire State during its time of need.  This is wrong.  https://t.co/vO0xwKZ9or

My fifth live forum on COVID-19 starts in just a few minutes. This week:  1. Mental health during this pandemic.  2. Update from DSS on the welfare of our children.  3. What's it like to be tested for COVID-19?  Simulcast on several outlets. Details: https://t.co/41DolBZmrQ https://t.co/fOKmiMEXnx

I'll be covering 3 big topics related to COVID-19 live this morning at 11 AM:  1. Mental health during this pandemic  2. Update from DSS on the welfare of our children  3. What's it like to be tested for COVID-19?  Simulcast on several outlets. Details: https://t.co/41DolBZmrQ

Mary and the folks at Community Cafe have been helping those in need long before COVID-19. Thank you @PuckerButt for this generous gift to help their work continue.  (I'm still too scared to eat your peppers but appreciate what you all do for our community!) https://t.co/MUXJXjcraX

This is truly scary. We knew #china owned state media but it turns out they can also control the United States’ media.   Comrade #bloomberg is not alone this goes for every outlet mindlessly repeating CCP talking points and “official” #covid figures. https://t.co/ndoiAO8TSI

Leave it to the @WHO to ignore Taiwan’s warnings about the Chinese COVID-cover-up only to accuse Taiwan of racism without a shred of evidence.   NO MORE FUNDING WITHOUT ACCOUNTABILITY! https://t.co/Hjds1qvAgv

🚨BREAKING🚨  South Carolina Governor @henrymcmaster has order all non-essential businesses to be CLOSED effective Wednesday April 1st due to #COVID19   Details: https://t.co/NFeLWr0Rbx https://t.co/0uhHBhNOes

It's truly remarkable to see how many people are reaching out to my office to ask how they can help the community & our nation combat #COVID19.   If you or your business are willing & ready to assist in relief efforts please see ➡️ @fema for #HowToHelp https://t.co/6BV6UQp9g2

Calling out to over 200000 constituents at the top of the hour for a live telephone town hall on the Coronavirus.  Joining me will be two doctors one an infectious disease specialist and the other with SC DHEC to help answer any questions.  844-881-1317 to join the call at 5P.

💰 Good News for Taxpayers 💰   As the U.S. continues to battle our common enemy the #Coronavirus the #taxdeadline will be extended from April 15th to July 15th.   Please share this update with your loved ones.  https://t.co/Zn0JvHvfML
Keep your loved ones safe by staying in touch virtually.   To reduce the spread of #COVID19 we all must practice social distancing whenever wherever possible.   #TogetherApart https://t.co/2wGDQft0iq
At the top of the hour I’ll be live with Lucas & Patti on @WRHI to discuss the Coronavirus.  100.1 FM in and around #YorkCo or anywhere online at https://t.co/MCGz7dGgfk
I am LIVE now with Fox Across America. Discussing #COVID19 with @jimmyfailla 📻  Listen on your radio or stream at https://t.co/LYcFT3WmEL

A tragic loss due to #COVID19 in our State. My thoughts and prayers are with the family.  This is a stark sign why we need to take serious precautions. I stand with @henrymcmaster in his efforts to protect all South Carolinians.  https://t.co/0Y69uvoZKv
I call on Nancy Pelosi to cancel "District Work Period" and get this worked out with both sides of the aisle to make a better solution to assist the American people affected by the #Coronavirus.

To call this reckless and irresponsible would be the understatement of the week.   I received a new version of this bill – not through any legitimate channels but instead… wait for it… from a lobbyist!  #Covid_19 https://t.co/R77vHY2f8W

Now is not the time to push your legislative agenda.   A National Emergency calls for bipartisanship not opportunism.    #COVID19 https://t.co/NzyBiFmNFN
It is essential we take individual action to keep ourselves and those around us safe.  ❗️Avoid Unnecessary Travel ❗️Wash Your Hands ❗️Seek Medical Attention  #coronavirus
